item.title: Caffe
item.description: Caffe (Convolutional Architecture for Fast Feature Embedding) 是最流行的深度学习框架之一。 Caffe安装 网络数据层（数据输入） 网络层（线性操作） 网络结构（由多个网络层构成的网络结构） 网络参

item.title: Reinforcement Learning
item.description: The correct input/output pairs are not present. The model will learn from a sequence of actions and select the action maximizing the expected sum of the future rewards. There is a discount factor that makes future rewards less valuable that current rewards.
